languages.text: "Другая дорога... дорога начинается с порога Простора и ведет к недрам зарождающегося ми... ми... ра..." {n}Идира вдруг становится серой и начинает хватать ртом воздух. Из ее хрипящего горла исторгается чужой голос — глухой, тяжелый рокот далекой лавины.{/n} "Читать нити судьбы — не твоя участь, раб{mf||а} трупа на троне! Ступай в объятья рока, ибо так предначертано Архитектором Судеб!"

"Another road... the road begins at the threshold of the Expanse and leads to the bowels of the emerging wor... wor... world..." {n}Idira turns grey and begins gasping for breath. A foreign voice tears its way out of her rasping throat — the deep, heavy rumbling of a distant avalanche.{/n} "Reading the threads of fate is not meant for you, slave of the enthroned corpse! Step into the embrace of doom, for thus was it preordained by the Architect of Fates!"
languages.original_text: "Другая дорога... дорога начинается с порога Простора и ведет к недрам зарождающегося ми... ми... ра..." {n}Идира вдруг становится серой и начинает хватать ртом воздух. Из ее хрипящего горла исторгается чужой голос — глухой, тяжелый рокот далекой лавины.{/n} "Читать нити судьбы — не твоя участь, раб{mf||а} трупа на троне! Ступай в объятья рока, ибо так предначертано Архитектором Судеб!"

languages.text: “是另一条路……这条路从扩区的门槛出发，延伸到世界的深……深……深处……”{n}伊迪拉脸色发灰，大口大口地喘着粗气。另一个陌生的声音从她的喉咙中迸发出来，仿佛遥远的雪崩发出的沉重的轰隆声。{/n}“窥视命运之线并不是你该做的事情，王座上那具尸体的奴隶！踏入灾厄的怀抱吧，这就是命运的设计师为你设计好的命运！”
languages.original_text: "Another road... the road begins at the threshold of the Expanse and leads to the bowels of the emerging wor... wor... world..." {n}Idira turns grey and begins gasping for breath. A foreign voice tears its way out of her rasping throat — the deep, heavy rumbling of a distant avalanche.{/n} "Reading the threads of fate is not meant for you, slave of the enthroned corpse! Step into the embrace of doom, for thus was it preordained by the Architect of Fates!"

A foreign voice tears its way out of her rasping throat — the deep, heavy rumbling of a distant avalanche.{/n} "Reading the threads of fate is not meant for you, slave of the enthroned corpse! Step into the embrace of doom, for thus was it preordained by the Architect of Fates!"

languages.text: «Otro camino... La senda comienza en el umbral de la Extensión y conduce a las entrañas del mundo emer... emer... gente...». {n}Idira se queda pálida y lucha por respirar. Una voz ajena se abre paso a la fuerza por su garganta ronca: el retumbar profundo y pesado de una avalancha distante.{/n} «¡Tus ojos no son dignos de vislumbrar los hilos del destino, esclava del cadáver entronado! ¡Abandónate a la perdición, tal y como ha dictado el Arquitecto de Destinos!».
languages.original_text: "Another road... the road begins at the threshold of the Expanse and leads to the bowels of the emerging wor... wor... world..." {n}Idira turns grey and begins gasping for breath. A foreign voice tears its way out of her rasping throat — the deep, heavy rumbling of a distant avalanche.{/n} "Reading the threads of fate is not meant for you, slave of the enthroned corpse! Step into the embrace of doom, for thus was it preordained by the Architect of Fates!"

traits.locale_text: «Otro camino... La senda comienza en el umbral de la Extensión y conduce a las entrañas del mundo emer... emer... gente...». {n}Idira se queda pálida y lucha por respirar. Una voz ajena se abre paso a la fuerza por su garganta ronca: el retumbar profundo y pesado de una avalancha distante.{/n} «¡Tus ojos no son dignos de vislumbrar los hilos del destino, esclava del cadáver entronado! ¡Abandónate a la perdición, tal y como ha dictado el Arquitecto de Destinos!».

languages.text: 「もうひとつの道…その道はエクスパンスの入り口から始まり、出現しつつあるわ…わ…惑星…の、深部へと続いているわ…」{n}イディラは蒼白になり、息を切らし始める。他なる声が、その荒れた喉から流れ出る。遠くで雪崩が鳴り響くような深く重い音だった。{/n}「運命の糸を読むのはあなたのためではない、玉座に座る屍のしもべよ！運命の抱擁の中に足を踏み入れよ、〈運命の構築者〉によって定められているのだから！」
languages.original_text: "Another road... the road begins at the threshold of the Expanse and leads to the bowels of the emerging wor... wor... world..." {n}Idira turns grey and begins gasping for breath. A foreign voice tears its way out of her rasping throat — the deep, heavy rumbling of a distant avalanche.{/n} "Reading the threads of fate is not meant for you, slave of the enthroned corpse! Step into the embrace of doom, for thus was it preordained by the Architect of Fates!"

traits.locale_text: 「もうひとつの道…その道はエクスパンスの入り口から始まり、出現しつつあるわ…わ…惑星…の、深部へと続いているわ…」{n}イディラは蒼白になり、息を切らし始める。他なる声が、その荒れた喉から流れ出る。遠くで雪崩が鳴り響くような深く重い音だった。{/n}「運命の糸を読むのはあなたのためではない、玉座に座る屍のしもべよ！運命の抱擁の中に足を踏み入れよ、〈運命の構築者〉によって定められているのだから！」

languages.text: "Eine weitere Straße ... die Straße beginnt an der Schwelle der Ausdehnung und führt in den Unterbauch der aufkommenden Wel... Wel... Welt ..." {n}Idiras Haut färbt sich grau und sie beginnt, nach Luft zu ringen. Eine fremde Stimme bricht aus ihrer krächzenden Kehle hervor — das tiefe, schwere Grollen einer Lawine in der Ferne.{/n} "Ihr seid nicht dazu bestimmt, die Fäden des Schicksals zu lesen, Sklavin des gekrönten Leichnams! Kommt in die Umarmung des Untergangs, denn so ist es vom Architekt des Schicksals vorherbestimmt!"
languages.original_text: "Another road... the road begins at the threshold of the Expanse and leads to the bowels of the emerging wor... wor... world..." {n}Idira turns grey and begins gasping for breath. A foreign voice tears its way out of her rasping throat — the deep, heavy rumbling of a distant avalanche.{/n} "Reading the threads of fate is not meant for you, slave of the enthroned corpse! Step into the embrace of doom, for thus was it preordained by the Architect of Fates!"

Welt ..." {n}Idiras Haut färbt sich grau und sie beginnt, nach Luft zu ringen. Eine fremde Stimme bricht aus ihrer krächzenden Kehle hervor — das tiefe, schwere Grollen einer Lawine in der Ferne.{/n} "Ihr seid nicht dazu bestimmt, die Fäden des Schicksals zu lesen, Sklavin des gekrönten Leichnams! Kommt in die Umarmung des Untergangs, denn so ist es vom Architekt des Schicksals vorherbestimmt!"

languages.text: « Une autre route... qui commence au seuil des Étendues et mène aux entrailles du monde émerg... émerg... émergeant... » {n}Idira blêmit et semble suffoquer. Une voix qui vous est inconnue émerge soudain de sa gorge et déferle sur vous tel le grondement puissant d'une avalanche.{/n} « La lecture des fils du destin ne vous est pas destinée, esclave du cadavre sur le trône ! Laissez-vous étreindre par la ruine, car ainsi l'Architecte du Destin en a-t-il décidé ! »
languages.original_text: "Another road... the road begins at the threshold of the Expanse and leads to the bowels of the emerging wor... wor... world..." {n}Idira turns grey and begins gasping for breath. A foreign voice tears its way out of her rasping throat — the deep, heavy rumbling of a distant avalanche.{/n} "Reading the threads of fate is not meant for you, slave of the enthroned corpse! Step into the embrace of doom, for thus was it preordained by the Architect of Fates!"

Une voix qui vous est inconnue émerge soudain de sa gorge et déferle sur vous tel le grondement puissant d'une avalanche.{/n} « La lecture des fils du destin ne vous est pas destinée, esclave du cadavre sur le trône ! Laissez-vous étreindre par la ruine, car ainsi l'Architecte du Destin en a-t-il décidé ! »

languages.text: "Bir yol daha... Bu yol, Enginlik'in eşiğinden başlayıp ortaya çıkan dünyanın derinliklerine doğru iler... İler... İlerliyor..." {n}İdira'nın beti benzi atıyor. Nefes almaya çalışıyor. Uzaklarda düşen bir çığın derinlerden gelen gümbürtüsü misali sesler çıkaran boğazından yabancı bir seda yükseliyor.{/n} "Tahttaki cesedin kölesi, kaderin iplerini okumak senin harcın değil! Kaderlerin Mimarı'nın önceden tayin ettiği üzere zevaline boyun eğ!"
languages.original_text: "Another road... the road begins at the threshold of the Expanse and leads to the bowels of the emerging wor... wor... world..." {n}Idira turns grey and begins gasping for breath. A foreign voice tears its way out of her rasping throat — the deep, heavy rumbling of a distant avalanche.{/n} "Reading the threads of fate is not meant for you, slave of the enthroned corpse! Step into the embrace of doom, for thus was it preordained by the Architect of Fates!"

traits.locale_text: "Bir yol daha... Bu yol, Enginlik'in eşiğinden başlar ve ortaya çıkan dünyanın derinliklerine doğru iler... İler... İlerliyor..." {n}İdira'nın beti benzi atıyor. Nefes almak için çabalamaya başlıyor. Uzaklarda düşen bir çığın derinlerden gelen gümbürtüsü misali sesler çıkaran boğazından yabancı bir ses yükseliyor.{/n} "Tahttaki cesedin kölesi, kaderin iplerini okumak senin harcın değil! Kaderlerin Mimarı'nın önceden tayin ettiği üzere zevaline boyun eğ!"
